name: persian date shortcode
author: esmail ebrahimi

sections.description:
• Easy way for Display persian date in multi format and unlimited color in wordpress site.
  • you can insert persian date in wigdet,post,page with simple shortcode .

  • also you can display persian date in favorite place of theme by “do_shortcode” function.

  • Persian Support in Kanithemes.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload persian-date-shortcode folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. for display persian date in theme : Place <?php do_shortcode('[wikiwordpress]'); ?> in your templates
  4. for display persian date in post,page or widget: use `[wikiwordpress]’ with or without parameters
sections.faq:
Where can I find more information and documentation about the plug-in?

You can read complete documentations on the Kanithemes.com
sections.changelog:
Version 1.2 – 2014-01-13

  • Added : Visual Settings tabs ( instead shortcode parameters )

Version 1.1 – 2013-12-09

  • Fixed : Solve Conflict with wp-jalali plugin
